1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.1.name: Cold Start
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.1.description: A coldStart trap signifies that the SNMP entity is reinitializing itself and that its configuration may have been altered

1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.2.name: Warm Start
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.2.description: A warmStart trap signifies that the SNMP entity is reinitializing itself such that its configuration is unaltered

1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3.name: Link Down
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.3.description: A linkDown trap signifies that the SNMP entity has detected that the ifOperStatus object has transitioned to the down state

1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4.name: Link Up
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.4.description: A linkUp trap signifies that the SNMP entity has detected that the ifOperStatus object has transitioned to the up state

1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.5.name: Authentication Failure
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.5.description: An authenticationFailure trap signifies that the SNMP entity has received a protocol message that is not properly authenticated

1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.6.name: EGP Neighbor Loss
1.3.6.1.6.3.1.1.5.6.description: An egpNeighborLoss trap signifies that an EGP neighbor has gone down and that the EGP peer relationship no longer exists
